Workflow.Name: Admin | Sync Template v3 (Portals)
Workflow.Description: This flow retrieves Power Apps Portal information. This information is retrieved from underlying Dataverse tables and requires the user running the flow to have system administrator privileges in the environment. Turning on this flow is optional, only turn this flow if you're using portals in your tenant and are interested in getting a tenant-wide overview.
